metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3533 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Ansible if an ansible user sets ANSIBLE_ASYNC_DIR to a subdirectory of a world writable directory. When this occurs, there is a race condition on the managed machine. A malicious, non-privileged account on the remote machine can exploit the race condition to access the async result data. This flaw affects Ansible Tower 3.7 and Ansible Automation Platform 1.2.

notes.Note: sbeattie> requires user to use a world writable directory apparently unfixed upstream as of 2022-01-14

criterions.comment: ansible package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-14').
ansible-core package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
